metadata.synopsis: Dialog with one of the Gortash's bodyguards in his office.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Black Gauntlet Numia - S_WYR_KillDirectorGortash_GortashsBodyguard_007 dd7a49bb-afb0-4425-8922-a94c3e91928b - (-30; 73; 198)

0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Numia
0.text: Speak if you wish. But I will not speak in return.

1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Numia
1.text: I am at my Lord's command.
